entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, who is questioning his own feelings and behavior.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend, who did not receive the prefect badge.

entities.name: draco malfoy
entities.description: A rival of Harry's, mentioned as an example of someone who might think themselves superior to others.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Harry's friend, who is often involved in adventures with Ron and Harry.

relationships.description: Harry compares himself to Ron, wondering if he thinks himself superior.
Harry uses Draco as an example of someone who might think themselves superior.
Harry mentions his adventures with Ron and Hermione.
